repos_data.description: Full-stack .Net 8 Clean Architecture (Microservices, Modular Monolith, Monolith), Blazor, Angular 18, React 18, Vue 3, BFF with YARP, Domain-Driven Design, CQRS, SOLID, Asp.Net Core Identity Custom Storage, OpenID Connect, Entity Framework Core, OpenTelemetry, SignalR, Hosted Services, Health Checks, Rate Limiting, Cloud Services (Azure, AWS, GCP).
Simple, lightweight, yet powerful way to build real-time web apps.
